sqlMap.select: select reportid, title, type, year, stockcode, stockname, filepath, lmodify from financialreport where reportid = #reportid:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert: insert into financialreport (reportid, title, type, year, stockcode, stockname, filepath, lmodify) values (#reportid:VARCHAR#, #title:VARCHAR#, #type:TINYINT#, #year:VARCHAR#, #stockcode:VARCHAR#, #stockname:VARCHAR#, #filepath:VARCHAR#, #lmodify:TIMESTAMP#)
sqlMap.update:
update financialreport
title = #title:VARCHAR#
type = #type:TINYINT#
year = #year:VARCHAR#
stockcode = #stockcode:VARCHAR#
stockname = #stockname:VARCHAR#
filepath = #filepath:VARCHAR#
lmodify = #lmodify:TIMESTAMP#
where reportid = #reportid:VARCHAR#
